name: Snowboard Racing Ultimate
description:
If you like the Extreme Sport, "Snowboard Racing Ultimate" is made for You!

Unlock new Snowboards by improving your skill on not less than 40 tracks!

You have the choice: "Boardercross" or "FreeRide"!
Select your Level: "Goomie", "Rookie" or "Expert" and slide down the steep slopes on your Snowboard!

Enjoy bumps and jumps for FreeStyle and you'll get more XP.
If you choose the off-piste, be careful to the trees! But know that more you take risks, more you get XP.

The tracks are very technical and require an optimal concentration!
Start with the initiation track to learn how to handle your Snowboard.
To access, click on the "Help" button in the main menu.
But don't be afraid, the first tracks are not so hard.
You can also set the accelerometer to adjust the handling in turns.

The time of each race is recorded.
Share your score online and try to stay in the World Ranking!
So you can compete with players around the World!
You can see the rankings at any time by clicking on the logo "World High Scores".

Incredible Slide and Speed Sensations await you!

It's up to you!

••• Game Features •••

• 40 Vertiginous tracks!
• Sliding Sensations that you never seen!
• Full 3D Real Time Rendering
• Customize your Snowboarder
• 2 modes: "BoarderCross" and "FreeRide"
• Choose your level
• Enter into the world rankings
• Music by "REVENGE"
